meanings.sent1: After withdrawing some money, she decided to redepositing it into her savings account.
meanings.sent2: I will be redepositing the books back on the shelf after I finish reading them.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel kept redepositing the acorns in the wrong hole, much to the confusion of the other animals.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness towards others is like redepositing goodwill into the community bank of humanity.
meanings.sent5: The rain redepositing the fallen leaves back onto the ground created a beautiful natural cycle.

meanings.sent1: The redepositing of the funds was necessary to complete the transaction.
meanings.sent2: His frequent redepositing of coins into the piggy bank showed his commitment to saving.
meanings.sent3: The redepositing of the keys in the wrong drawer caused a comical mix-up in the office.
meanings.sent4: The redepositing of memories in her mind felt like rearranging a puzzle to find the missing piece.
meanings.sent5: The redepositing of sand by the waves created a constantly changing shoreline along the beach.
